# contentful_locale (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "contentful_locale" "example_locale" {
  space_id = "spaced-id"

  name          = "locale-name"
  code          = "de"
  fallback_code = "en-US"
  optional      = false
  cda           = false
  cma           = true
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- **code** (String)
- **name** (String)
- **space_id** (String)

### Optional

- **cda** (Boolean)
- **cma** (Boolean)
- **fallback_code** (String)
- **id** (String) The ID of this resource.
- **optional** (Boolean)

### Read-Only

- **version** (Number)
